Class MultiRoom

  • java.lang.Object
    • easydarwin.android.videostreaming.MultiRoom

  • public class MultiRoom
extends java.lang.Object
    This a function class, it includes the major functions used in VideoStreamingFragment

      • createMultiUserRoom

        public boolean createMultiUserRoom(org.jivesoftware.smack.XMPPConnection connection,
                          java.lang.String roomName)
                            throws org.jivesoftware.smack.XMPPException
        Create multiple users chat room (no password). You need to call MultiUserChat.create(String).
        Parameters:
        connection - XMMP connection
        roomName - chat-room name
        Returns:
        return true if creating room successfully
        Throws:
        org.jivesoftware.smack.XMPPException - XMPP connection exception

      • createMultiUserRoom

        public boolean createMultiUserRoom(org.jivesoftware.smack.XMPPConnection connection,
                          java.lang.String roomName,
                          java.lang.String password)
                            throws org.jivesoftware.smack.XMPPException
        Create multiple users chat room (with password). You need to call MultiUserChat.create(String).
        Parameters:
        connection - XMMP connection
        roomName - chat-room name
        password - the password to join the room
        Returns:
        return true if creating room successfully
        Throws:
        org.jivesoftware.smack.XMPPException - XMPP connection exception

                     throws org.jivesoftware.smack.XMPPException
        Join a chat room by default (no password). You need to call MultiUserChat.join(String).

        roomName - chat-room name
        Returns:
        return true if join the chat room successfully

      • joinChatRoom

        public boolean joinChatRoom(org.jivesoftware.smack.XMPPConnection connection,
                   java.lang.String roomName,
                   java.lang.String password)
                     throws org.jivesoftware.smack.XMPPException
        Join a chat room by default (with password). You need to call MultiUserChat.join(String, String).
        Parameters:
        connection - XMPP connection
        roomName - chat-room name
        password - the password to join the chat-room
        Returns:
        return true if join the chat room successfully
        Throws:
        org.jivesoftware.smack.XMPPException - XMPP connection exception

      • getChatRoomList

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getChatRoomList(org.jivesoftware.smack.XMPPConnection connection,
                                                    java.lang.String serviceName)
                                                      throws org.jivesoftware.smack.XMPPException
        Get Existing rooms, and rejoin it. You need to call MultiUserChat.getHostedRooms(org.jivesoftware.smack.Connection, String). FIXME: you can only join the room that you are allowed. solution1: when rejoin, send message to owner, and owner make a decision solution2: create chat room with password and give it to friends
        Parameters:
        connection - XMPP connection
        serviceName - chat room service on openfire server
        Returns:
        roomList A list of all the chat-room or null if there's no rooms
        Throws:
        org.jivesoftware.smack.XMPPException

      • inviteToChatRoom

        public boolean inviteToChatRoom(org.jivesoftware.smack.XMPPConnection connection,
                       java.lang.String roomName,
                       java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> friendsList)
                         throws org.jivesoftware.smack.XMPPException
        Invite users to a chat room (no password). You need to call MultiUserChat.invite(String, String)
        Parameters:
        connection - XMMP connection
        roomName - chat-room name
        friendsList - the list of selected friends
        Returns:
        return true if sending invitation successfully
        Throws:
        org.jivesoftware.smack.XMPPException

      • inviteToChatRoom

                       java.lang.String password)

        connection - XMMP connection
        roomName - chat-room name
        friendsList - the list of selected friends

      • storeMediaStream

        public void storeMediaStream(java.lang.String room)
        Use openRTSP tool to store media stream into a file, details see: http://www.live555.com/openRTSP. You need to start a new thread MultiRoom.StreamAsyncTask PATH: file path is current file path of openRTSP FileName: -F filename
        Parameters:
        room - chat-room name

        public boolean departChatRoom(org.jivesoftware.smack.XMPPConnection connection,
                     java.lang.String room)
        Destroy /leave the chat room. You need to call MultiUserChat.destroy(String, String).
        Parameters:
        connection - XMPP connection
        room - chat-room name
        Returns:
        return true, if departing/destroying room successfully
